name: sendwise-batch-transfers
description: Smart Batch Transfers for ETH & ERC20 Tokens - Farcaster Mini App

scripts.build: echo 'Static HTML app - no build required' && mkdir -p public && cp -r index.html js styles .well-known package.json vercel.json public/
scripts.vercel-build: echo 'Static HTML app - no build required' && mkdir -p public && cp -r index.html js styles .well-known package.json vercel.json public/

author: Sendwise Team
